title: Captain Long Beard Rapid Beard Growth Formula - Powerful Blend with PABA, Horsetail Extract, Fo-Ti, Bamboo Extract, Stinging Nettle, Chinese Peony, Spirulina, Saw Palmetto, Plant Sterols, Alfalfa, and Barley - 60 Capsules
descriptionHtml:
Achieve the Beard of Your Dreams with Captain Long Beard Rapid Beard Growth Formula

Achieve the beard of your dreams with Captain Long Beard Rapid Beard Growth Formula. This powerful supplement is meticulously crafted to support and enhance beard growth, ensuring you get a fuller, thicker, and healthier beard. Our unique blend of natural ingredients works synergistically to promote hair growth, improve hair strength, and provide essential nutrients for optimal beard health.

Key Ingredients and Their Benefits

P-amino Benzoic Acid (PABA): PABA is known for its role in preventing hair loss and maintaining natural hair color. It supports the overall health of hair follicles, promoting robust beard growth. Horsetail Extract (Equisetum arvense L.): Rich in silica, horsetail extract strengthens hair strands, reduces breakage, and enhances shine. It supports the structural integrity of hair, promoting healthier beard growth. Fo-Ti (Polygonum multiflorum): A traditional Chinese herb used for centuries to promote hair growth and prevent hair thinning. Fo-Ti nourishes hair follicles and enhances hair density. Bamboo Extract (Phyllostachys viridis): Bamboo extract is a rich source of silica, which supports hair strength and elasticity. It helps reduce hair breakage and promotes thicker beard growth. Stinging Nettle (Urtica dioica L.): Known for its anti-inflammatory properties, stinging nettle helps reduce scalp irritation and promotes healthier hair follicles. Chinese Peony (Paeonia lactiflora): Chinese Peony root supports blood circulation, delivering essential nutrients to hair follicles and promoting healthy beard growth. Spirulina (Arthrospira platensis): Spirulina is packed with proteins, vitamins, and minerals that nourish hair follicles, enhancing overall beard health and promoting growth. Saw Palmetto (Serenoa repens): Saw palmetto helps block DHT, a hormone that contributes to hair loss, promoting fuller and thicker beard growth. Alfalfa (Medicago sativa): Rich in vitamins and minerals, alfalfa supports overall hair health and promotes stronger hair growth. Barley: Barley contains essential nutrients that support hair growth and improve hair strength and texture.

Why Choose Captain Long Beard Rapid Beard Growth Formula?

Advanced Beard Growth: Our formula is designed to target multiple aspects of beard growth, ensuring you achieve a fuller, thicker, and healthier beard. Natural Ingredients: We use only high-quality, natural ingredients that are known for their effectiveness in promoting hair growth and health. Scientifically Backed: Our blend includes ingredients that are supported by scientific research and traditional use for promoting hair growth and overall hair health. Convenient and Effective: Each bottle contains 60 easy-to-swallow capsules, providing a one-month supply when taken as directed.

Grow Your Beard with Confidence

Unlock the potential of your beard with Captain Long Beard Rapid Beard Growth Formula. Our powerful blend of natural ingredients supports healthy, robust beard growth, giving you the confidence to sport the beard youâ€™ve always wanted. Trust Captain Long Beard to deliver the results you need for a fuller, thicker, and healthier beard.
shortDescriptionHtml: Achieve a fuller, thicker beard with Captain Long Beard Rapid Beard Growth Formula. Our powerful blend of PABA, horsetail extract, Fo-Ti, bamboo extract, and more supports robust beard growth and overall beard health. 60 capsules per bottle.
supplementFacts:
Supplement Facts
Serving Size: 2 Capsules
Servings Per Container: 30

Amount Per Serving / %DV
Vitamin A (as Beta-carotene) 120 mcg RAE 13%
Vitamin C (as Ascorbic acid) 120 mg 133%
Calcium (as Calcium carbonate) 80 mg 6%
Iron (as Ferrous fumarate) 14.5 mg 81%
Vitamin D3 (as Cholecalciferol) 20 mcg 100%
Vitamin E (as DL-Alpha tocopheryl acetate) 14 mg 93%
Vitamin B1 (as Thiamine mononitrate) 6 mg 500%
Vitamin B6 (as Pyridoxine HCL) 8 mg 471%
Folate 1,467 mcg DFE 367% (880 mcg Folic Acid)
Vitamin B12 (as Cyanocobalamin) 12 mcg 500%
Biotin 600 mcg 2,000%
Vitamin B5 (as D-Calcium pantothenate) 30 mg 600%
Magnesium (as Magnesium Oxide) 120 mg 29%
Zinc (as Zinc Oxide) 7 mg 64%
Manganese (as Manganese amino acid chelate) 4 mg 174%
Potassium (as Potassium gluconate) 12 mg <1%
Proprietary Blend: 409 mg **
PABA, L-Tyrosine HCL, Horsetail extract (Equisetum arvense L.) (Whole herb), Fo-Ti (Polygonum multiflorum) (root), Bamboo extract (Phyllostachys viridis) (leaf), Nettle root (Urtica dioica L.), Peony (Paeonia lactiflora) (root), Spirulina (Arthrospira platensis) (whole plant), Saw palmetto (Serenoa repens) (fruit), Plant sterols (Glycine max) (seed), Alfalfa (Medicago sativa) (herb), Barley grass (Hordeum vulgare L.) (aerial)

** Daily Value (DV) Not Established

Inactive Ingredients: Cellulose (Vegetable Capsule), Rice Flour, Magnesium stearate, Silicon dioxide. Contains: Soy
